items.title: How a $200 Fake Fireplace From Home Depot Soothed My Soul
items.description: Research shows that watching a simulated fire may have real psychological benefits.

items.description: Here's how to make iPhone and Android devices a little easier to use.

items.title: 2025’s Best Phones Were Also Its Wackiest
items.description: If anything, iPhones and Pixels are practically vanilla. The next generation is thinner, more transparent, and folds in half. That’s a good thing.

items.title: The Gloves Are Off in the Fight for Your Right to Repair

items.title: The year data centers went from backend to center stage
items.description: Data centers are no longer the boring tech issue they once were.
